languages.text: {n}Я глубоко втягиваю воздух, и нечто дурманное, ядовито-приторное тревожит мое обоняние. Не обычный запах, нечто тоньше и... сквернее. От Гнили тоже пахнет этим.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Я глубоко втягиваю воздух, и нечто дурманное, ядовито-приторное тревожит мое обоняние. Не обычный запах, нечто тоньше и... сквернее. От Гнили тоже пахнет этим.{/n}

languages.text: {n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Я глубоко втягиваю воздух, и нечто дурманное, ядовито-приторное тревожит мое обоняние. Не обычный запах, нечто тоньше и... сквернее. От Гнили тоже пахнет этим.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}
{n}I draw in a deep breath, and something stupefying, poisonous and luscious disturbs my sense of smell. This is no ordinary odour but something subtle and... foul. Mildew smells like it, too.{/n}

{n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my olfactory sense. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as mould.{/n}

{n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my olfactory sense. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as mould.{/n}
{n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}
{n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}
{n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ich atme tief ein, und etwas Betäubendes, Giftiges und Starkes stört meine Sinne. Es ist kein gewöhnlicher Geruch, sondern etwas Subtiles und ... Fauliges. Es riecht wie Fäule.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ich atme tief ein, und etwas Betäubendes, Giftiges und Starkes stört meine Sinne. Es ist kein gewöhnlicher Geruch, sondern etwas Subtiles und ... Fauliges. Der Gestank erinnert an Mehltau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Respiro hondo y algo aturdidor, nocivo y delicioso confunde mis sentidos. No es un olor común, sino algo sutil e... impuro. Tiene el mismo hedor que Podredumbre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Respiro hondo y algo aturdidor, nocivo y delicioso confunde mis sentidos. No es un olor común, sino algo sutil e... impuro. Tiene el mismo hedor que Moho.{/n}

languages.text: {n}深く息を吸うと、ぼーっとするような、毒々しい甘美な何かに感覚をかき乱される。これは普通のにおいではなく、繊細で…腐敗したにおいだ。ロットと同じ悪臭がする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}深く息を吸うと、ぼーっとするような、毒々しい甘美な何かに感覚をかき乱される。これは普通のにおいではなく、繊細で…腐敗したにおいだ。カビと同じような悪臭がする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我深吸一口气，某种令人陶醉、让人昏昏欲睡的味道扰乱了我的感官，令我头晕目眩。这种味道并不常见，而是某种既微妙、又……邪恶的味道，散发着与“脓疮”同样的恶臭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我深吸一口气，某种令人陶醉、让人昏昏欲睡的味道扰乱了我的感官，令我头晕目眩。这种味道并不常见，而是某种既微妙、又……邪恶的味道，散发着与“霉毯”同样的恶臭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je prends une profonde inspiration et quelque chose de stupéfiant, de délétère et de nauséabond trouble mes sens. Ce n'est pas une odeur ordinaire, mais une sensation subtile... répugnante. Sa puanteur est semblable à celle de Pourriture.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je prends une profonde inspiration et quelque chose de stupéfiant, de délétère et de nauséabond trouble mes sens. Ce n'est pas une odeur ordinaire, mais une sensation subtile... répugnante. Sa puanteur est semblable à celle de Moisissure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Derin bir nefes alıyorum. Bunaltıcı, zehirli ve tiksindirici bir şey, duyularımı rahatsız ediyor. Sıradan bir koku değil bu. Daha incelikli ve... Menfur bir şey. Çürük'le aynı pis kokuyu taşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I take a deep breath, and something stupefying, noxious, and luscious disturbs my senses. This is no ordinary odour, but something subtle and... foul. It carries the same stench as Rot.{/n}
